content: Hey all- just wanted to drop by and call out https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78515, which adds a switchable buffering mode to stdout. This should be the roughly second to last PR needed before we can have stdout choosing between block & line buffering mode at startup based on isatty or your platform's equivelent. It includes some new public API stuff so I want to make sure it gets a lot of eyes
